plan.path.pathfinding
Interface PathFinder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AStar
public interface PathFinder

An interface which makes it possible for a robot to find a path from one point on the tile map to another one based on that tile map.

Author:
Daniel Stanoescu

Method Summary
 Path findPath(Robot robot, int sx, int sy, int dx, int dy)
          Finds a path from (sx, sy) to (dx, dy) on a tile map taking into account the obstacles defined and also the cost of moving from one tile to the other
 

Method Detail

findPath

Path findPath(Robot robot,
              int sx,
              int sy,
              int dx,
              int dy)
Finds a path from (sx, sy) to (dx, dy) on a tile map taking into account the obstacles defined and also the cost of moving from one tile to the other

Parameters:
robot - The unit that we want to move along the path
sx - The x coordinate of the origin of the path
sy - The y coordinate of the origin of the path
dx - The x coordinate of the destination of the path
dy - The y coordinate of the destination of the path
Returns:
The path from (sx, sy) to (dx, dy) or Null if no path was found
